Posts.Content: Mar 7, 2015 04:17AM fairfieldlady wrote: I had a mastectomy on 3rd March this year and since the anaesthetic I have trouble swallowing certain foods.  It's odd because some meals are fine, and others difficult. I hoped it was the anaesthetic but it appears to be getting worse - bread, cake, and chicken a particular problem.  I'm eating a lot of soup! I haven't had radiation but wonder if there is any connection at all between drugs used during surgery and this problem.  I am hoping it goes away because I worry about oesphogeal cancer.
Posts.Title: Difficulty swallowing, a radiation side efffect? nanabolini yoga_girl
